Package gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.meta.descriptors

Interface Summary
BoPropertyDescriptor<T> Generic interface for the specification of a business property.
BoPropertyDescriptorWrapper<T> Wrapper of a BoPropertyDescriptor.
NumberBoPropertyDescriptor<T extends Number> BoPropertyDescriptor for numeric properties.
PropertyDefinition A PropertyDefinition object has all the necessary information for the creation of a BoPropertyDescriptor.
 

Class Summary
AbstractBoPropertyDescriptor<T> Basic abstract implementation of BoPropertyDescriptor.
AbstractIntTypesBoPropertyDescriptor<T extends Number> BoPropertyDescriptor for types without decimal digits.
AbstractNumberBoPropertyDescriptor<T extends Number> Abstract implementation of NumberBoPropertyDescriptor.
BigDecimalBoPropertyDescriptor BoPropertyDescriptor for BigDecimal.
BooleanBoPropertyDescriptor BoPropertyDescriptor for boolean values.
DateBoPropertyDescriptor BoPropertyDescriptor for dates.
DoubleBoPropertyDescriptor BoPropertyDescriptor for Double.
FloatBoPropertyDescriptor BoPropertyDescriptor for Float.
IntegerBoPropertyDescriptor BoPropertyDescriptor for Integer properties.
LongBoPropertyDescriptor BoPropertyDescriptor for Long.
SelectionBoPropertyDescriptor<T> Property description for a property that is selected by a list of values.
StringBoPropertyDescriptor BoPropertyDescriptor implementation for String properties.
